post:
Need a Cheap Dedi? How About $24.95/mo with 10TB in Seattle! Thanks, Reprise Hosting

cheap dedi, cheap server, dedi, reprise, reprise hosting, seattle May 28, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome back, Reprise Hosting!  They’re bringing us some awesome dedi offers:

  • $24.95 for a 6-core/12-thread L5640!
  • Or $34.95 for a 12-core/24-thread dual model!

Granted, it’s an older chip (Q1 2010) but if you crave isolation and burning CPU 24×7 – not to mention 10TB of bandwidth per month – these cheap servers might be the offers for you!

Reprise Hosting is registered in Delaware, USA (6186230) and are AS62838. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal, Credit Card, Bitcoin and Alipay.

Here’s a little about Reprise Hosting in their own words:

For the past decade, Reprise Hosting has been a leader in the self-managed cheap dedicated servers space. We offer servers with robust hardware, a strong network and proven uptime/reliability. We provide straightforward honest service. In our nearly 10 years of business, we have never increased our rates or hiked prices on our customers. We post our third-party uptime stats publicly going back to 2013 ( https://tinyurl.com/repriseuptime ). We are based out of Seattle, WA, USA in the Westin Building Exchange — one the largest telecommunications hubs in the world. Our network is a redundant blend of NTT, Zayo, Telia and HE plus direct peering with Microsoft, Google, Amazon, IBM Cloud, Netflix, Akamai, Charter, T-Mobile, Telus, OVH, CloudFlare, Yahoo, Facebook, Twitter, Internap, Valve, Twitch, SK Broadband, SpaceX Starlink, Telekom Indonesia, and many others.

For this LowEndBox special offer we are discounting our entry-level bare metal servers more than we ever have before! Reprise Hosting is pleased to offer our RepriseZDED at $24.95/month and our RepriseZZDED at $34.95/month. These exceptionally low prices represent the best bargains on self-managed dedicated servers that you’ll find anywhere. Coupon code LEBFIRST10 and is limited to the first 10 buyers.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!

RepriseZDED Spring ’21 LowEndBox Special

  • Double memory! Free upgrade to 16GB memory with promo code.
  • Intel Xeon L5640 Six Core CPU (12 threads)
  • 1TB HDD. Free swap to a 240GB SSD upon request during checkout in order comments.
  • Free upgrade to 10TB premium multi-homed bandwidth with promo code.
  • Free upgrade to a 1Gbps port with promo code.
  • 2x usable IP addresses.
  • IPMI: yes
  • Coupon: LEBFIRST10 (promo code limited to the first 10 buyers)
  • $24.95/month
  • [ORDER]

RepriseZZDED Spring ’21 LowEndBox Special

  • Double memory! Free upgrade to 32GB memory with LEBFIRST10 promo code.
  • 2x Intel Xeon L5640 Six Core CPU (12 cores, 24 threads)
  • 1TB HDD. Free swap to a 240GB SSD upon request during checkout in order comments.
  • Free upgrade to 20TB premium multi-homed bandwidth with promo code.
  • Free upgrade to a 1Gbps port with promo code.
  • 4x usable IP addresses.
  • IPMI: yes
  • Coupon: LEBFIRST10 (promo code limited to the first 10 buyers)
  • $34.95/month
  • [ORDER]

NETWORK INFO:

  • Datacenter: Westin Building Exchange – Seattle, WA
  • Test IPv4: 162.253.153.4
  • Test file: http://test.reprisehosting.com/1000MB.test
Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!

I'm Andrew, techno polymath and long-time LowEndTalk community Moderator. My technical interests include all things Unix, perl, python, shell scripting, and relational database systems. I enjoy writing technical articles here on LowEndBox to help people get more out of their VPSes.
